frontMatter.title: Button Group
frontMatter.description: Arranges multiple buttons as separate elements with gaps between them

related.name: Button - Segmented
related.description: Related options in a compact container

when_to_use.value: Provide primary and secondary response options to questions (default variation)
Enable form input saving with Update/Cancel buttons
Navigate through multi-step form flows with Back/Continue buttons

when_to_consider_else.value: For navigation outside form flows, use [Link](/docs/components/link/)
For visually prominent calls-to-action linking elsewhere, use [Action links](/docs/components/link/action)

behavior.value: Avoid excessive buttons on single pages
Arrow icons reserved exclusively for Back/Continue variations

content_considerations.value: Use sentence case for button labels

accessibility.value: Include contextual information via aria-label for screen readers
Specify form numbers or program names for greater clarity

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Default Yes/No -->
<va-button-pair></va-button-pair>

<!-- Back/Continue -->
<va-button-pair continue></va-button-pair>

<!-- Update/Cancel -->
<va-button-pair update></va-button-pair>

<!-- Custom labels -->
<va-button-pair
  left-button-text="Save draft"
  right-button-text="Submit"
></va-button-pair>
